roleset.name: to store in a hive like bees

example.name: Collection
example.text: I had hived away a collection of empty plastic water bottles.
example.arg: a collection of empty plastic water bottles.

roleset.note: HIVE-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel entries to VN, PB and sense groupings. Framed by Claire. No appropriate VN entry found. (from hive.01-v)

roleset.name: to (cause to) gather in a hive, move like a hive

role.descr: Agent causing movement, gathering into hive

example.name: With arg1 as subject
example.text: At least 50000 bees hived within the walls of one of our rooms.
example.arg: within the walls of one of our rooms.

example.name: With agent
example.text: She hived her bees in Brooklyn.

roleset.note: HIVE-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel entries to VN, PB and sense groupings. Framed by Claire. (from hive.02-v)
